## Description {#details}

Represents a value which can be a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> or a constant.

This is useful in situations where an instruction may have an interesting register operand or interesting constant operand. For a concrete example, 
<SectionUser title="See Also">
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a387427d56330771ba6f190e27776a327">getVectorSplat</a>.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line 399 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/utils-h">Utils.h</a>.
